properties.title: Web Service Test Coverage - TCPMon SOAP Monitoring in soapUI

section.name: SOAP Monitor Coverage
section.p: When enabling WSDL Coverage for a SOAP Monitor, soapUI will continuously accumulate and analyze monitored requests and add their coverage to the Coverage Panel. This can be used in many situations, for example:

ul.li: If you are running manual tests and want to see how much these cover, you can run these through a SOAP Monitor and analyze the results.
If you want to see the actual utilization of a contract in a testing or live environment.

section.p: When collecting coverage for a SOAP Monitor, the Coverage Panel only contains the Interface-related part of the Coverage Tree, since no TestSuites/TestCases are applicable during this analysis;
Next: Web Service Test Usage Scenarios

div.p: As the only test tool in the world, soapUI Pro shows you how much of your Web Services you have tested
